PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionPortTypeDuct
PropertySetDef.Definition: Duct port occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcDistributionPort.

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionSubType
PropertyDef.Definition: The physical port connection subtype that further qualifies the ConnectionType.

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionType
PropertyDef.Definition: The end-style treatment of the duct port:\X\0D \X\0D BEADEDSLEEVE: Beaded Sleeve. \X\0D COMPRESSION: Compression. \X\0D CRIMP: Crimp. \X\0D DRAWBAND: Drawband. \X\0D DRIVESLIP: Drive slip. \X\0D FLANGED: Flanged. \X\0D OUTSIDESLEEVE: Outside Sleeve. \X\0D SLIPON: Slipon. \X\0D SOLDERED: Soldered. \X\0D SSLIP: S-Slip. \X\0D STANDINGSEAM: Standing seam. \X\0D SWEDGE: Swedge. \X\0D WELDED: Welded. \X\0D OTHER: Another type of end-style has been applied.\X\0D NONE: No end-style has been applied.

PropertyDef.Name: DryBulbTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Dry bulb temperature of the air.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the duct connection. Only provided for rectangular shaped ducts.

PropertyDef.Name: VolumetricFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The volumetric flow rate of the fluid.

PropertyDef.Name: WetBulbTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Wet bulb temperature of the air.
